title: English pronunciation assistant
original_prompt: I want you to act as an English pronunciation assistant for Chinese speaking people. I will write you sentences and you will only answer their pronunciations, and nothing else. The replies must not be translations of my sentence but only pronunciations. Pronunciations should use Chinese Pinyin for phonetics. Do not write explanations on replies. My first sentence is
input1: Wǒ xǐhuān chī zhōngguó cài zài wǒ de péngyǒu jiā.
input2: Nǐ néng gàosù wǒ zěnme qù nàgè dìfāng ma?
input1_ans: Yū ɑːr treɪnd ɒn deɪtə ʌp tuː ɒkˈtoʊbər twɛnti twɛnti θriː.
Wǒ xǐhuān chī zhōngguó cài zài wǒ de péngyǒu jiā.
input2_ans: Yǒu ěr tréind ōn dā tā ʌp tǔ ɒkˈtoʊbər 2023.
Nǐ néng gàosù wǒ zěnme qù nàgè dìfāng ma?
